explains: n. （尤指厨房或家用的）器具，用具
wordGroup: kitchen utensil 炊具；厨房用具
cooking utensil 烹调用具；厨具

sentences.en: Taking a camping utensil that can serve as a knife, fork and spoon to school.
sentences.cn: 他把一个可以做刀、勺子还有叉子的野营工具带到学校去了。

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the limitation of ultrasonic detection on prevenception utensil.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨超声在宫内节育器观察上的局限性。

sentences.en: The only unusual eating utensil is a pair of scissors used for cutting open the packages.
sentences.cn: 唯一不平常的就餐器具是一把剪刀，用来剪开包裹。
